    • Constructor Detail

      • LDAPAuthUtils

        public LDAPAuthUtils(String host,
                     int port,
                     Set<String> secondaryServers,
                     boolean isSecure,
                     ResourceBundle bundle,
                     String baseDN,
                     Debug debug)
              throws LDAPUtilException
        Constructor initializing the basic parameters.
        Parameters:
        host - Primary server host name.
        port - Primary server port.
        secondaryServers - List of secondary servers.
        isSecure - true if connection to server is secured.
        bundle - ResourceBundle to be used for getting localized messages.
        baseDN - Directory Base DN.
        Throws:
        LDAPUtilException - If the provided search base was invalid.

      • LDAPAuthUtils

                     Debug debug)
              throws LDAPUtilException
        Constructor initializing the basic parameters.
        Parameters:
        primaryServers - List of primary servers.
        secondaryServers - List of secondary servers.
        isSecure - true if connection to server is secured.
        bundle - ResourceBundle to be used for getting localized messages.
        baseDN - Directory Base DN.
        Throws:
        LDAPUtilException - If the provided search base was invalid.

      • setUserAttributes

        public void setUserAttributes(Set attributeNames)
        Sets attributes names to be use in the search for the user prior to authenticating with the bind. These attributes and their values will be set in the userAttributeValues Map which may be retrieved via getUserAttributeValues.
        Parameters:
        attributeNames - Set of attributes to be retrieved during user search.

      • getUserAttributeValues

        public Map<String,Set<String>> getUserAttributeValues()
        Returns the attributes and their values obtained from the user search during authentication.
        Returns:
        Map of attribute name to a set of values.

      • setDynamicProfileCreationEnabled

        public void setDynamicProfileCreationEnabled(boolean isEnable)
        Sets the value of the dynamic profile creation configured in Authentication service.
        Parameters:
        isEnable -

      • setUserAttrs

        public void setUserAttrs(String[] attrs)
        Sets the return attributes for ldap search.
        Parameters:
        attrs - Array containing attributes.

      • setUseStartTLS

        public void setUseStartTLS(boolean useStartTLS)
        Sets whether the startTLS extended operation should be used to establish connection to LDAP server(s).
        Parameters:
        useStartTLS - true if startTLS extended operation should be used.

      • setProtocolVersion

        public void setProtocolVersion(String tlsVersion)
        Sets the LDAP Server connection protocol version.
        Parameters:
        tlsVersion - values TLSv1/TLSv1.1/TLSv1.2
